getIndex

private int getIndex(java.lang.String caption)
Find the position for menu with specified caption according to static pattern.

Returns:
int position of the menu with specified caption in the menu bar. The position is greater then pattern.length in case of not being present in the pattern.

addMenu

public void addMenu(javax.swing.JMenu menu)
Add menu into the menu bar according to static pattern. If caption of the menu isn't specified in the pattern then the menu is added at the end of the menu bar.
